Posts.Content: May 23, 2012 11:12PM - edited May 24, 2012 04:41AM by enlighten Hello! You guys seem like a great supportive group of women. Like Beth I'm also new here. Tomorrow I find out what my treatment plan has in store for me next. I have been taking a hormones regimen for the last 2 weeks. I am experiencing two different doctors not on the same page with my treatment plan. So I'm looking for answers tomorrow. Still hard to believe sometimes how life just changed over night. But I'm up for the fight.
Posts.Title: I'm new here. bphillips100 enlighten
